analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: the serial absorptions,🔽the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love,🔽great compassion,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /

analyzed: snying rje chen po'am / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /

original: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: or the attributes of a

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: the qualities of a pratyekabuddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
translated: the qualities of a bodhisattva,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
translated: or the qualities of a buddha, and they work for the welfare of sentient beings and carry out the activities of sentient beings.

original: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig /
analyzed: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig /
translated: “To those sentient beings who are stingy, they teach the Dharma like this: ‘Give gifts!

original: phongs pa ni /
analyzed: phongs pa ni /
translated: Poverty

original: sdug bsngal pa ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal pa ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: phongs pas ni /
analyzed: phongs pas ni /
translated: Because of poverty,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you are unable to carry out your own aims,🔽let alone the aims of others.

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi; de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi; de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: Therefore, by giving gifts, you should make yourselves happy

original: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: and make others happy as well.

original: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston te /
analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston te /
translated: Do not be overcome by poverty, devouring your own flesh, and be unable to escape the three lower realms.’

original: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: “To those sentient beings who have bad ethics, they teach the Dharma like this:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh, beings!

original: tshul khrims ngan pa ni /🔽sdug bsngal ba ste; tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa ni / sdug bsngal ba ste; tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
translated: “Those with bad ethics🔽are miserable.

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: If you cannot accomplish your own goals with bad ethics,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: what need is there to mention accomplishing the goals of others?

original: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: The ripening of bad ethics

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi @384a *//🔽skye gnas sam /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi @384a *// skye gnas sam /
translated: is the hells,🔽the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or the world of the Lord of Death.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: what need is there to mention saving others?

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow even a single thought of bad ethics to arise.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not later become regretful.”

original: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: “To those sentient beings who have harmful thoughts toward each other, they teach the Dharma as follows:

original: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
translated: ‘Do not have harmful thoughts toward each other.

original: sems 'khrugs par 'gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems 'khrugs par 'gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: When the mind is disturbed, no virtuous qualities can arise.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: if you become disturbed with each other,

original: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
translated: you will be reborn in the hells,🔽you will be reborn in the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
translated: or you will be reborn in the world of Yama.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: do not give an opportunity to even a slight disturbance.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later you will regret it.

original: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings who are lazy, he teaches the Dharma as follows:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people,

original: le lo ni /
analyzed: le lo ni /
translated: laziness

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: le los ni /
analyzed: le los ni /
translated: Because of laziness,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you are unable to accomplish your own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone the goals of others.

original: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The ripening of laziness🔽is rebirth as a hell being,🔽an animal,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par @384b mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par @384b mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow any opportunity for even a single thought of laziness.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not be regretful later on!’

original: sems can sems g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can sems g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings whose minds are distracted, they teach the Dharma as follows:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people!

original: sems g-yeng ba ni /
analyzed: sems g-yeng ba ni /
translated: A distracted mind

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The ripening of a distracted mind🔽is the realm of the hell beings,🔽the realm of the animals,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or the realm of the Lord of Death.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,🔽let alone others.

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi; de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi; de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow any opportunity for even a single thought of distraction.’

original: phyi sa 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyi sa 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to //
translated: I teach the Dharma to those who are remorseful about their excrement.

original: sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those who have faulty wisdom, I teach the Dharma as follows:

original: kye skyes bu dag /🔽shes rab 'chal ba ni /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag / shes rab 'chal ba ni /
translated: ‘Oh beings!

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /🔽shes rab 'chal bas ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste / shes rab 'chal bas ni /
translated: Faulty wisdom is suffering.

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /🔽gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te; shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na / gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te; shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: If you cannot accomplish your own purpose with faulty wisdom,🔽what need is there to speak of the purpose of others?

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am /
translated: The result of faulty wisdom is rebirth as a hell being,

original: byol song gi skye gnas sam /🔽gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam / gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: an animal, or a hungry ghost.

original: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //🔽phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to //🔽'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o // phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to // 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
translated: Therefore, you should not allow even the thought of faulty wisdom to arise.🔽I teach the Dharma to those who are remorseful about their faulty wisdom.🔽To those whose behavior is dominated by desire, I teach the Dharma of ugliness.

original: zhe sdang gi spyod @385a *//
analyzed: zhe sdang gi spyod @385a *//
translated: To those whose behavior is dominated by hatred, I teach the Dharma of love.

original: pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
translated: I connect those who are attached to desire with loving kindness.

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
translated: I connect those who are attached to ignorance with dependent origination.

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
translated: I connect those who have entered bad paths with the right path.

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
translated: I connect them with the path of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: the path of the pratyekabuddhas,🔽and the path of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: I teach them the Dharma like this:

original: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
translated: ‘Those phenomena that you are attached to

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: are empty of inherent nature.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
translated: It is not possible to be attached to phenomena that are empty of inherent nature.

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: There is no attachment to emptiness.

original: zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: zhes chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma in this way.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
translated: In this way, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, coursing in the perfection of wisdom, standing in the superknowledges, works the weal of beings.

original: de lca'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
analyzed: de lca'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
translated: With that very pure divine eye, which is superior to the human, he sees all the world systems in the southern region,

original: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
translated: and he goes to them by his magic power and works the weal of beings by means of gifts,

original: tshul khrims sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims sam /
translated: of morality,🔽of patience,

original: bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
analyzed: bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
translated: of vigour,

original: bsam gtan nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan nam /
translated: of meditation,

original: shes rab bam /
analyzed: shes rab bam /
translated: of wisdom,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
translated: of the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: of the right efforts,🔽of the bases of psychic power,

original: dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /
translated: of the faculties,

original: stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams sam /
translated: of the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
translated: of the limbs of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @385b brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @385b brgyad pa'am /
translated: of the path,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
translated: the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation;

original: bsam gtan rnams sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: the meditative stabilities;

original: tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /
translated: the immeasurable aspirations;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the formless absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam / ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
translated: the aspects of liberation;🔽the meditative stabilizations;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the serial absorptions;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
translated: the fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /🔽byams pa chen po'am /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽great love;

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /
translated: great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of śrāvakas;

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of pratyekabuddhas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /

analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

original: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /

original: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

analyzed: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /

original: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /
translated: or in the animal realm,🔽or in the world of Yama.

original: byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
translated: or in the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
translated: or in the world of Yama,

analyzed: de bas @388b na; khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later on, you will regret it.

analyzed: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people,

original: le lo ni /
analyzed: le lo ni /

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: le los ni /
analyzed: le los ni /

analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /

analyzed: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The result of laziness🔽is rebirth as a sentient being in hell,🔽in the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone save others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

analyzed: sems can sems g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /

analyzed: sems g-yeng ba ni /

analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /

analyzed: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am /

analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /

translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

translated: let alone others.

analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos @389a *//

original: ston te / kye skyes bu dag /🔽shes rab 'chal ba ni /
analyzed: ston te / kye skyes bu dag / shes rab 'chal ba ni /
translated: ‘Oh, men!🔽Poor intellect is suffering.🔽Because of poor intellect,

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /

original: shes rab 'chal bas ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal bas ni /

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: Because of desire, you are unable to accomplish your own purpose, let alone the purpose of others.🔽The result of desire is🔽the world of the hells,🔽the animal world,🔽and the world of Yama.🔽In that way, you should not allow even the opportunity for a single thought of desire to arise.🔽Later, you will have regrets.’🔽To those who have a conduct of desire, he teaches the Dharma like this: ‘Oh, men!🔽Desire is suffering.

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: Because of desire, you are unable to accomplish your own purpose, let alone the purpose of others.

original: shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: The result of desire is🔽the world of the hells,

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am /
translated: the animal world,🔽and the world of Yama.🔽In that way, you should not allow even the opportunity for a single thought of desire to arise.🔽Later, you will have regrets.’🔽To those who have a conduct of desire, he teaches the Dharma like this: ‘Oh, men!

original: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: Desire is suffering.🔽Because of desire, you are unable to accomplish your own purpose, let alone the purpose of others.🔽The result of desire is🔽the world of the hells,🔽the animal world,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: and the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: In that way, you should not allow even the opportunity for a single thought of desire to arise.🔽Later, you will have regrets.’🔽To those who have a conduct of desire, he teaches the Dharma like this: ‘Oh, men!

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Desire is suffering.🔽Because of desire, you are unable to accomplish your own purpose, let alone the purpose of others.🔽The result of desire is🔽the world of the hells,

analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /

analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi nus te; stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do // zhes chos ston to //

analyzed: de dag gi bya ba byed de /

analyzed: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni /

analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

analyzed: phongs pas ni; bdag gi dan kyang bya bar mi nus na /

analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi /

analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /

original: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /

analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

analyzed: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh beings!

original: tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa ni /

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: are suffering.

original: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
translated: Those with bad ethics

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: are unable to accomplish even their own goals,🔽let alone the goals of others.

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te; gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te; gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The ripening of bad ethics🔽is the realm of hell beings,🔽the realm of animals,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or the realm of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you.

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /

analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed @390b cig /

analyzed: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: de lta bas na /

analyzed: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /

translated: or you will be reborn in the world of the Lord of Death.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

analyzed: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

analyzed: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings who are lazy, they teach the Dharma as follows:

analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /

original: le los ni /
analyzed: le los ni /

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na; gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na; gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: you will not be able to accomplish your own goals, let alone the goals of others.

original: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The result of laziness🔽is rebirth as a sentient being in hell,🔽as an animal,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or in the realm of the Lord of Death.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you should not give an opportunity to even a single thought of laziness.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later on, you will regret it.’

original: sems can sems g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can sems g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma to those sentient beings whose minds are distracted, saying:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh, people!

original: sems g-yeng ba ni /
analyzed: sems g-yeng ba ni /
translated: A distracted mind

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The ripening of a distracted mind🔽is the world of the hells,🔽the animal world,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan @391a *// gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan @391a *// gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yang ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yang ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, do not give an opportunity to even a single distracted thought.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not later become regretful.’

original: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma to those sentient beings who have bad wisdom, saying:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh, people!

original: shes rab 'chal ba ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal ba ni /
translated: Bad wisdom

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: shes rab 'chal bas ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal bas ni /
translated: Because of bad wisdom,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: If you are unable to accomplish your own purpose,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: what need is there to speak of the purpose of others?

original: shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smon pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smon pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am /
translated: The ripening of faulty wisdom is🔽the hells,

original: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: the animal realm,🔽or the world of Yama.

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te; de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te; de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: You should not allow even the slightest opportunity for faulty wisdom to arise.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later on, you will regret it.

original: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
translated: Those who engage in desire, I teach them the repulsiveness of the body.

original: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyad pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyad pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
translated: Those who engage in anger, I teach them love.

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
translated: Those who engage in delusion, I teach them dependent origination.

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
translated: Those who have entered bad paths, I teach them the right path.

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
translated: The path of the hearers,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: the path of the solitary buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: They connect them to the Buddha’s path, and they teach them the doctrine as follows:

original: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur ba'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur ba'i chos de dag ni /
translated: ‘Those phenomena that you have become fixated on

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni /
translated: Phenomena that are empty of an intrinsic nature

original: mngon par zhen @391b par mi nus te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen @391b par mi nus te /
translated: cannot be fixated on.

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: There is no fixation on emptiness.’

original: zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: zhes chos ston to //
translated: They teach the doctrine in such a way.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in that way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom stand in the clairvoyances and work for the welfare of sentient beings.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya go brgyad pa; de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya go brgyad pa; de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
translated: “With that very pure divine eye, surpassing that of humans, he sees all the world systems in the upper direction.🔽He goes there by his miraculous power and teaches the Dharma to beings,

original: de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyi song zhing sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyi song zhing sbyin pa'am /

analyzed: tshul khrims sam //

analyzed: bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /

analyzed: bsam gtan nam /

original: shes rab bam /
analyzed: shes rab bam /

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /

analyzed: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig /

analyzed: phongs pa ni /

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /

original: phongs pas ni /

analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /

analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /

analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not be overcome by poverty, eating the flesh of your own children, and be unable to escape the three lower realms.”

analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /

analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /

analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /

analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /

analyzed: gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa de ni / sems can dmyal ba'am /

original: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: or the world of Yama.

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /

original: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems can tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems can tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: In this way, you will not give even the slightest opportunity to beings with confused wisdom.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

original: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni /

original: mi sdug pa'i sbyor ro //
analyzed: mi sdug pa'i sbyor ro //

original: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni /

original: byams pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: byams pa la sbyor ro //

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni /

original: lam ngan par @393b zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni /

original: yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
translated: I connect to the right path.

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam /

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te; khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
translated: I teach them the Dharma in the following way: ‘The phenomena to which you are attached

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: are empty of their own essential nature.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni /

analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi nus te /

analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //

original: zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: zhes chos ston to //

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in that way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they stand in the higher knowledges and work for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus te /

original: lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par mi nus so //
analyzed: lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par mi nus so //
translated: They cannot lead sentient beings who have entered wrong paths to the path.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / bya 'dab ma med pas ni /
analyzed: dper na / bya 'dab ma med pas ni /

original: nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so //
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so //

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being cannot teach the doctrine to beings without having recourse to the superknowledges.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste /🔽de mngon par @394a *//

analyzed: de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //
translated: and he sees all the beings who have been born there.

original: de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam /

translated: Having seen them, he goes there by his magical power, and having understood the minds of those beings, he teaches them the Dharma accordingly, with discourses on generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi gtam mam /🔽bzod pa'i gtam mam /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi gtam mam / bzod pa'i gtam mam /
translated: the discourse of morality,🔽the discourse of patience,

translated: the discourse of perseverance,

original: shes rab kyi gtam mam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi gtam mam /
translated: the discourse of wisdom,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam /
translated: the discourse of the noble truths,🔽up to the discourse of the elements.

original: 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to; ;des lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to; ;des lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste /
translated: With the divine eye he sees as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges in the upper direction.

original: de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //
analyzed: de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //
translated: He also sees all the sentient beings who have been born in those places.

original: de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gis sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam /
analyzed: de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gis sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam /
translated: Having seen them, he goes to them by means of his miraculous powers, and having understood their minds, he gives them a discourse on generosity in accordance with them,🔽a discourse on morality,

original: tshul khrims kyi gtam mam; bzod pa'i gtam mam /

analyzed: 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to // de'i lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste /
translated: He teaches the Dharma to beings, up to the Dharma of emergence.

original: lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra'ang thos te /
analyzed: lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra'ang thos te /
translated: With his divine ear, which is purified and surpasses human hearing, he hears both far and near,🔽the sounds of gods, humans, and the sounds of the Dharma.

original: de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to //

translated: In the eastern direction, in as many world systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, he hears the Dharma that the blessed buddhas teach. Having heard it, he retains it as it is.

original: de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te /
